page.title: 11 'IN YEARS GONE BY'
page.content: Mrs.Rees is 80 years old and she has lived in Tonna all her life.She was born at 53,Henfaes Terr. and she went to the old Tonna school. She remembers many things about that school.At playtime she used to play Hopscotch,Skipping and Rounders. During lesson time they learned the alphabet,followed by letter sounds, tables,sums,music,writing and reading. They didn't have a school uniform like us and everyone wore what their parents could afford.The boys wore boots with nails in and everyone kept their best clothes for special occasions. She also remembers V.E.Day when everyone was dancing in the streets. Tonna is always a happy place,although it has changed a great deal.A change for the better perhaps!!........
